While other generators upload your sensitive information (like WiFi passwords or private URLs) to their servers before rendering a code, QR Studio performs the entire generation process locally within your own browser."]}],["$","p",null,{"children":"Using modern client-side JavaScript libraries, your data never leaves your device.
